wikipedia_page.main: Captain Ronald Olaf Hambro (1 December 1885 – 25 April 1961) was a British merchant banker.  He was chairman of Hambros Bank from 1932 to 1961.

response: Major Jocelyn Olaf Hambro MC (7 March 1919 – 19 June 1994) was a British merchant banker, horsebreeder and philanthropist. He served as the Chairman of Hambros Bank from 1965 to 1972.

Jocelyn Olaf Hambro was born on 7 March 1919 on Upper Brook Street in Mayfair, London, the son of Winifred Emily Ridley-Smith and Olaf Hambro.Andrew St George, Obituary: Jocelyn Hambro, The Independent, 24 June 1994Charles Mosley (ed.), Burke's Peerage and Baronetage, Crans, Switzerland: Burke's Peerage, 1999, vol. 1, p. 1278
